name: The Walking Sim
description:
This was made in the Ludum Dare 44 Jam as a team of 4 which was our first.

Due to many difficulties, our Hack and Slay game turned out to be one of the best walking sims out there :)
The sadness which we all have within us got perfectly projected on this art piece.
The time you play this game is the time, and as a result currency that you lose in life.
